title: Secure WildFly applications with OpenID Connect
content: WildFly 25 enables you to secure deployments using OpenID Connect (OIDC) without installing a Keycloak client adapter. This tutorial will show a proof of concept example of it. Keycloak with Quarkus The latest version of Keycloak is based on Quarkus Runtime. If you are still running the old Keycloak engine, we recommend checking this article ...
